comments.author: sayrer@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/annotate/d8fda3716eae/content/html/content/src/nsGenericHTMLElement.cpp#l759

Seems like we know the size of the buffer we have, so we should call nsHtml5Module::NewHtml5Parser() with a size argument. The alternative is a buffer of zero size.
comments.creator: sayrer@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/annotate/d8fda3716eae/content/html/content/src/nsGenericHTMLElement.cpp#l759
> 
> Seems like we know the size of the buffer we have, so we should call
> nsHtml5Module::NewHtml5Parser() with a size argument. The alternative is a
> buffer of zero size.

FWIW, that call site is going away in bug 596182, so it doesn't make sense to add an argument to NewHtml5Parser().
